metadata.name: Mshtml.DLL RunHTMLApplication Suspicious Usage
metadata.comment: Detects execution of commands that leverage the "mshtml.dll" RunHTMLApplication export to run arbitrary code via different protocol handlers (vbscript, javascript, file, http...)

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\..\\')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('mshtml')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('#135')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('runhtmlapplication'))))

output.summary: Detects execution of commands that leverage the "mshtml.dll" RunHTMLApplication export to run arbitrary code via different protocol handlers (vbscript, javascript, file, http...)
